scenario_text.value:
Hey, Takuma!
You look pissed off!

And you look depressed.
Are you okay?

I never get depressed.
You should be more worried about yourself.

(But making him recognize that he’s sad won’t
necessarily change anything.)
(I’ll have to keep an eye on him...)

(I’m concerned about Dracmon...
But I’ll just see how things go for now.)
